project_preview_description.text: A simple chatroom app built using React and ws WebSocket

project_description.text: Chatty App is a personal project at Lighthouse Labs that introduces building React class components and WebSockets. Features include: Changing usernames, Displaying number of users online, real time messaging amongst multiple users, and rendering image links as image

siteMetadata.title: Jerry Chuang's Portfolio
siteMetadata.description: A portfolio powered by Gatsby and Prismic to showcase portfolios and blogs.
